Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 "It shall be done that way.  I feel we should call our troops to retreat 
back your troops so we can explain what has happened and unify ourselves. 
Hydras is a name fate has put in our spark. It is how it was meant to be." 
His head bobbed up and down.

--part1_129.17651cba.2ab40942_boundary
